50  template < typename UnmanagedPersistorType >
51  DeviceProfilePersistorUnmanagedWrapper< UnmanagedPersistorType >::DeviceProfilePersistorUnmanagedWrapper()
52  {
53  m_pPersistor = new UnmanagedPersistorType();
54  }
55 
56  template < typename UnmanagedPersistorType >
57  DeviceProfilePersistorUnmanagedWrapper< UnmanagedPersistorType >::~DeviceProfilePersistorUnmanagedWrapper()
58  {
59  delete m_pPersistor;
60  m_pPersistor = NULL;
61  }
62 
63  template < typename UnmanagedPersistorType >
64  void DeviceProfilePersistorUnmanagedWrapper< UnmanagedPersistorType >::LoadAllProfiles(List< DeviceProfile^ > ^% lstProfilesOut, String ^% msActiveProfileIdOut)
65  {
66  std::vector< ISAgentDeviceProfile > vecProfilesLocal;
67  std::string sActiveProfileIdLocal;
68 
69  // use the unmanaged persistor to load all profiles
70  int nErr = m_pPersistor->loadAllProfiles(vecProfilesLocal, sActiveProfileIdLocal);
71  if (nErr)
72  {
73  throw gcnew SdkException(nErr);
74  }
75 
76  // create the managed list of DeviceProfile objects
77  DeviceProfile::FromUnmanagedList(vecProfilesLocal, lstProfilesOut);
78 
79  // write to the active device ID output string
80  msActiveProfileIdOut = MarshalUtil::GetManagedString(sActiveProfileIdLocal);
81  }
82 
83  template < typename UnmanagedPersistorType >
84  void DeviceProfilePersistorUnmanagedWrapper< UnmanagedPersistorType >::SaveAllProfiles(List< DeviceProfile^ > ^ lstProfiles, String ^ msActiveProfileId)
85  {
86  // translate managed DeviceProfile objects into unmanaged
87  std::vector< ISAgentDeviceProfile > vecProfilesLocal;
88  DeviceProfile::ToUnmanagedList(lstProfiles, vecProfilesLocal);
89 
90  // translate active device ID to unmanaged string
91  std::string sActiveProfileIdLocal = MarshalUtil::GetUnmanagedString(msActiveProfileId);
92 
93  // use the unmanaged persistor to save all profiles
94  int nErr = m_pPersistor->saveAllProfiles(vecProfilesLocal, sActiveProfileIdLocal);
95  if (nErr)
96  {
97  throw gcnew SdkException(nErr);
98  }
99  }
100 
101  template < typename UnmanagedPersistorType >
102  ISAgentDeviceProfilePersistor * DeviceProfilePersistorUnmanagedWrapper< UnmanagedPersistorType >::GetUnmanaged()
103  {
104  return m_pPersistor;
105  }
107  } // namespace SDK
108 } // namespace IonicSecurity
